staff: ^Behold, brave adventurer! You have discovered the Staff of Alchemy. This legendary staff holds the power to control the very elements, bend reality to your will, and turn any water into **sparkling** water. Do you wish to pick up the staff?

c-0: ^Well, that was way easier than I expected. Time to get out of this creepy old temple.
c-1: ^Are you sure? This staff will make you one of the most powerful wizards ever. Plus, it matches your robe. Do you wish to pick up the staff?
